vendor_name: Norbu The Montanna Dharamshala IHCL SeleQtions
title: Luxe Taj Himalayan Villa Paradise with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Floral Bath Experience
description:
Nestled in the beauteous lap of Kangra Valley in Himachal Pradesh, the five-star Norbu The Montanna, Dharamshala - IHCL SeleQtions from Taj Hotels is a radiant jewel in the Himalayas. Spread across seven acres, the Tibetan-inspired décor and architecture of the hotel are quick to mesmerise. A scenic 10-hour drive from New Delhi and only a 30-minute drive from Gaggal Airport (DHM), the hotel redefines mountain luxury with its premium amenities and gorgeous views. Lounge by the Lhasa River-inspired artificial stream, dip in the heated outdoor pool, feast on traditional Himachali dham, taste lip-smacking global cuisine, or kick back in style in the exquisitely designed rooms and suites. Home to Dalai Lama's monastery, Dharamshala is ideal for experiencing the rich Tibetan and Himachali culture.

Relax and unwind in the ethereal surroundings with a soulful yoga session, sip on fine tea blends and indulge in a Tibetan degustation experience at the property. Dotted by snow-capped peaks on the horizon, regale in the bliss of your Himalayan escape as you enthrall yourself with a visit to the nearby Kangra Fort and tea gardens and make your holiday memorable.
location_description: Norbu The Montanna Dharamshala IHCL SeleQtions
offer_address: Village Banordu, Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh , 176053, India

title: Tranquil Five-Star Hillside Hideaway near Shimla with Decadent Dining & One Child Stays Free
description:
Lose yourself in the mesmerising beauty of nature at Royal Tulip Shimla, Kufri Hills, a five-star luxury resort perched on a wooded hillside of Kufri, just a 30-minute drive from Shimla. Stay in the shadow of the majestic Shivalik range in the Himalayas and breathe in the fresh mountain air at this gorgeous hilly hideaway.

An overnight drive from Delhi, the resort boasts large, open spaces, inspiring views of the mountains and valleys, and a sense of luxury synonymous with the famed Louvre Hotels Group. The resort's warm ambience flows into its hospitality and contemporary comforts, such as an indoor heated pool, kids' area, restaurants and spa. Grab your family and friends and experience the healing power of nature at this hilltop hideaway.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy a non-alcoholic welcome drink on arrival
- Wake up every morning with a buffet breakfast at Promenade Restaurant
- Enjoy one buffet dinner at Promenade Restaurant, once per stay
- Unwind with one cocktail, glass of wine or beer (one drink per adult, per stay) at Cedar Bar
- Make the most of your stay with daily INR500 dining credit per package
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** One child (10 and under) stays free in existing bedding with all package inclusions (excludes alcohol).

**Longer stay bonus:** Stay 4+ nights and enjoy two buffet dinners per stay, plus two drinks (cocktail, glass of wine or beer) per adult, per stay.

vendor_name: Tree of Life Eila Art Hotel Naggar
title: Grand Opening: Unique Art-Inspired Naggar Stay with Daily Breakfast & Dinner
description:
Rising out of the picturesque hills of Naggar in Himachal Pradesh, Tree of Life Eila Art Resort Naggar is a newly built resort calling your name. Set amid the Deodhar forests with the rippling Beas River meandering in the valley below, the resort is a cocoon of serenity. This uniquely designed resort - located conveniently between the towns of Kullu and Manali and only an hour's drive from Bhuntar Airport - will enchant you with its contemporary architecture and scenic, mountainous views at every corner. Pull yourself away from the city's limits and head to this tranquil retreat, where art, literature, cuisine and wellness converge into a unique artsy structure.

Rooms that draw inspiration from the local beauty will embrace you in a warm hug like Mother Nature itself. Choose from a wide range of dining options that will delight both your palate and your eyes. A spa for soothing your nerves, a yoga deck for perfecting your Surya Namaskar, a gorgeous outdoor pool, and a fascinating art gallery - considered to be one of the finest ones in town - add to the charm of this resort.
location_description: Tree of Life Eila Art Hotel Naggar
offer_address: Jana Road, Khasra No 2403 Opposite Forest Department Range Office, Manali Tehsil Naggar Himachal Pradesh 175130 India

title: Eco-Friendly Himachal Mountain Escape in Palampur with All-Inclusive Dining & Daily Activities
description:
Perched on a hilltop, with the magnificent Dhauladhar mountains of Himachal Pradesh as a backdrop, Rakkh Resort, a Member of Radisson Individuals Retreat, is a unique retreat perfect for city-weary souls. Set on 4.5 acres of rolling green hills, this sustainable paradise perfectly combines adventurous experiences and transformative living. An overnight drive from Delhi (approximately 10 hours), the Himalayan gem is situated close to the popular destinations of McLeod Ganj and Dharamshala, making it easy to experience the best of the region. Quaint cottages overlooking the verdant valley, an infinity pool guarded by the majestic mountains and delectable cuisine that never lets you down - the mountains are indeed calling.

One of the most famous resorts in the lap of the snow-clad hills in Palampur, the hotel is situated in the midst of the glittering Dhauladhar ranges and has stunning 180-degree views of the surrounding hills and valleys. With spectacular views of the verdant Kangra Valley and the Tripadvisor Best of the Best Award 2022 for Top Small Stays - India, the resort is one of the finest boutique resorts in the region and is the perfect place to recharge. Plus, the tranquil resort is a champion of sustainability and responsible tourism through its eco-friendly architecture, plastic-free amenities, local kitchen garden that supplies all the ingredients for your meals and more.
location_description: Rakkh Resort, a Member of Radisson Individuals Retreat
offer_address: Ghamrota Village Post Office Ballah, Tehsil Palampur, District Kangra, Jiun, Himachal Pradesh 176061
